ohoma una gaman dan tharamwath mata iwasillka na ee dawaswala mama hithannema aksidant wela kiyala thama.dahapahalos wathawak withara kol karala baluwa eeth na.dan ithin mama gedara thatta thaniyama hotu pera pera andanawa.passe gaththa eyage mallita anda anda kiwwa wisthare eetapasse gaththa eyage ammata eyatath kiwwa ape akkatath kol karala kiwwa dan seramala ape gedara enna lasthiya.kohoma hari winadi 20ta withara passe menna eyagen kol ekak enawa.mama walapi walapi aansar karanakota eya hithala mata mokak hari karadarayak kiyala.passe balanakota ithin eya mata masej dala fon oof karanawa bosa ekka mitin kiyala mata ithin ee ilaw masej eka aawe na.
